summary: God Save My Shoes is the first documentary film to explore the intimate relationship between women and shoes, questioning why shoes are the most addictive item in a woman's closet and how shoes have become a totem object.
cast: Manolo Blahnik|Meghan Cleary|Fergie|Filipa Fino|Christian Louboutin|Kelly Rowland|Elizabeth Semmelhack|Beth Shak|Walter Steiger|Monica Von Neumann|Dita Von Teese
title: Â¡Dios salve a mis zapatos!
